results.authors: By Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway
results.headline: Understanding Elon Musk’s Lead in Outer Space

results.authors: By Carolina Gonzalez and Maya Averbuch
results.headline: Peso Rout Deepens as Morgan Stanley Warns of ‘Deterioration’
results.summary: The Mexican peso added to losses Tuesday as President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador doubled down on the importance of a judicial reform that critics fear would erode checks on the country’s ruling party.

results.headline: Biden Shows His Best After Hunter Biden Gun Conviction
results.summary: The president’s response is another stark reminder and important contrast with Donald Trump.

results.authors: By Michael O'Boyle and Maya Averbuch
results.headline: Peso Gets Crushed as Sheinbaum Struggles to Reassure Investors
results.summary: Mexico’s president-elect was set to inherit the world’s top performing currency. Instead she’s confronting a historic slump in the peso that’s casting a pall over her early days in leadership.

results.headline: Bob Menendez Broke Up With Girlfriend Over ‘Too Much Drama’
results.summary: The rift between Senator Bob Menendez and his wife at his bribery trial deepened when his lawyer suggested she schemed behind his back to secure a Mercedes-Benz and that the New Jersey Democrat broke up with her at one point over “too much drama.”

results.headline: Biden Plan to Brand Trump a Felon Is Hit by Son’s Conviction
results.summary: Hunter Biden, like Donald Trump, is now a convicted felon — a personal and political blow to his father, President Joe Biden, that complicates his 2024 campaign for reelection.

results.authors: By Iain Rogers and Michael Nienaber
results.headline: Scholz Condemns Far-Right Lawmakers for Zelenskiy Speech Boycott
results.summary: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz pilloried lawmakers from the far—right Alternative for Germany and the far-left BSW parties for boycotting Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy’s speech to the nation’s parliament.

results.authors: By Chris Strohm, David Voreacos, and Greg Farrell
results.headline: Why Hunter Biden’s Gun and Tax Trials Are Trouble for the President
results.summary: The troubled life of Hunter Biden continues to weigh on his father, US President Joe Biden, who’s seeking a second term in November.

results.authors: By Patricia Laya and Denis Chabrol
results.headline: US Sanctions Guyana’s Wealthy Mohamed Family on Gold Probe
results.summary: The US Treasury’s Office sanctioned Nazar Mohamed, his son Azruddin and their company Mohamed’s Enterprise on Tuesday for their alleged roles in public corruption in Guyana.

results.headline: South African elections: Zuma Asks Top Court to Stop Parliament Sitting
results.summary: Former South African President Jacob Zuma’s party petitioned the Constitutional Court to stop parliament from convening, just days before legislators are scheduled to elect the president.
